animation.condition: Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(scripts) | Window.IsActive(videofiles) | [[Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(musiclibrary)] + IsEmpty(ListItem.Artist)] | [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videomovies) + !Container.Content(movies)] | [Window.IsActive(pictures) + IsEmpty(ListItem.PictureDateTime)]

control.visible: Control.IsVisible(50) + [[[Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(videofiles) | Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(scripts) | [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + !Skin.HasSetting(videotv)]] + !Skin.HasSetting(slimlist)] | [[Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] + !Skin.HasSetting(slimlisttv)] | [Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)] + !Skin.HasSetting(slimlistmusic)]

Control.IsVisible(50) + [[[Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(videofiles) | Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(scripts) | [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + !Skin.HasSetting(videotv)]] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlist)] | [[Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlisttv)] | [Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlistmusic)]
Control.IsVisible(50) | Window.IsActive(contextmenu) | Window.IsActive(mediasource) | Window.IsActive(126) | Window.IsActive(shutdownmenu) | Window.IsActive(movieinformation)
Control.IsVisible(50) | Window.IsActive(contextmenu) | Window.IsActive(mediasource) | Window.IsActive(126) | Window.IsActive(shutdownmenu) | Window.IsActive(movieinformation)

itemlayout.condition: [[Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(videofiles) | Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(scripts) | [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + !Skin.HasSetting(videotv)]] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlist)] | [[Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlisttv)] | [[Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(musiclibrary)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlistmusic)]

focusedlayout.condition: [[Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(videofiles) | Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(scripts) | [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + !Skin.HasSetting(videotv)]] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlist)] | [[Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlisttv)] | [[Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(musiclibrary)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlistmusic)]

control.visible: [Control.IsVisible(50) + [[Window.IsActive(pictures) | Window.IsActive(videofiles) | Window.IsActive(programs) | Window.IsActive(scripts) | [Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + !Skin.HasSetting(videotv)]] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlist)] | [[Window.IsActive(videolibrary) + Skin.HasSetting(videotv)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlisttv)] | [[Window.IsActive(musicplaylist) | Window.IsActive(musicfiles) | Window.IsActive(musiclibrary)] + Skin.HasSetting(slimlistmusic)]] | Window.IsActive(contextmenu) | Window.IsActive(mediasource) | Window.IsActive(126) | Window.IsActive(shutdownmenu) | Window.IsActive(movieinformation)
